/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++14 -g -g3   CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/Bomb.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/Block.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/Player.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/Entity.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/IrrData.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/Bomberman.cpp.o CMakeFiles/indie_studio.dir/sources/eventReceiver.cpp.o  -o indie_studio -rdynamic -L./lib/ -lIrrlicht -lGL -lGLU -lXext -lX11 -lXxf86vm
